tool.help:
**What it does**
EBI Search, also named as 'EB-eye', is a scalable search engine that:
- provides text search functionality and uniform access to resources and services hosted at the European Bioinformatics Institute (EMBL-EBI) - is based on the consolidated Apache Lucene technology - exposes both a Web and RESTful Web Services interfaces - provides inter-domain navigation via a network of cross-references
